name: ADRENALINA #03
description: How did I get here? What am I doing at this party? ~ This piece is 3/9 of the Adrenalina series, an exploration of parties as rituals. Enjoyable horror scenarios where excitement and adrenaline posses attendees. Listening to Kim Petras's Turn the Light Off vol. II and watching Climax during 2020's quarentine was a big inspiration for this set of illustrations.
